body: Prerequisite: Resistance 5 to any energy type; Benefit: Members of this race increase their resistance to one energy type to 10. Special: This racial trait can be taken multiple times. Each additional time you take this trait, increase its cost by 1 RP, and increase one other resistance to 10.
name: Improved Resistance
